page.title: 20CONTRASTS IN RAMSBOTTOM AREA
page.content: The area around Ramsbottom holds many contrasts. Ramsbottom itself is a very close-knit community with much {industry}for its size and good shopping facilities for every day requirements. The surrounding settlements are purely residential, with no industry and limited shopping facilities. The{population structure}of the area also varies from settlement to settlement. Ramsbottom has a larger proportion of older people who live on their own than do the other settlements. This can possibly be explained by the fact that Ramsbottom has more smaller cottages than do the other places and these are ideal for single occupants. Also the shops are much closer to hand in Ramsbottom.The other settlements tend to have a much more{mobile population}than Ramsbottom
